en-US.name: Stitch Counter
en-US.summary: A hands-free knitting row counter with project management and smart reminders.
en-US.description: Stitch Counter helps you track your knitting rows without putting down your needles. Say 'next row' to increment your counter, manage multiple projects by name, and set reminders for specific rows like decreases or color changes. The skill gives you a heads-up the row before so you're always prepared.
examplePhrases: Alexa, tell stitch counter next row
Alexa, ask stitch counter what row am I on

publishingInformation.testingInstructions: Create a project, increment rows, set reminders, and switch between projects.
